## Slide with Plot made using Plotly 

```{r cars, echo = FALSE,message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(plotly, , quietly = TRUE)
set.seed(12340)
d <- diamonds[sample(nrow(diamonds), 5000), ]
plot_ly(d, x = ~carat, y = ~price, color = ~log(price), size = ~carat) 

```
